about_the_game:
No pain, no gain!

Spice up your Trimmer Tycoon experience with this sporty cosmetic DLC! The Sports Skin Bundle includes five brand new customer skins from a variety of sports. The new characters will be added into all customer tiers.

This pack includes the following skins:
- Gym dude
- Footbal player
- Soccer player
- Ice hockey player
- Basketball player

This DLC is meant as a way to support us with little donations while getting awesome content in return. Please see the other DLCs (Improx Skin Bundle, Fantasy Skin Bundle and Holiday Skin Bundle) for different donation amounts and even more awesome skins.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities
